comments.body: I believe we also agreed to test that `__dict__` has only one entry and the value of that entry is equal to `self.dir0.h`. Same for the other tests below.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +50,54 @@        self.dir0.h
        # check that after call __dict__ is not empty anymore
        self.assertTrue(self.dir0.__dict__)
        # check that __dict__ has only one entry
        self.assertEqual(len(self.dir0.__dict__), 1)
